title: Add /Cancel the alarm clock.
answer:
On the home screen, click Clock. 

 Click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110257) again to enter the Alarm Clock interface. 

 Click Add alarm and set the alarm clock bell time. 

 Check REPEAT, and select the alarm clock cycle to be repeated. 

 Click Ringtones, and select the Alarm clock bell. 

 Check Vibrate, and set the phone to vibrate when the alarm clock bell rings. 

 Click Label, and input the name of the alarm clock time. 

 In the alarm clock interface, you can see a list of all current alarm clocks. Drag the button to cancel the alarm clock. Or hold an alarm clock record and click the trash can icon at the upper right corner to delete your selected alarm clock.
